Defender, ward {3} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If you reveal a Mutant card this way, you may instead put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
